title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the InnovationIncubator platform, including features, user roles, workflows, and integration with existing systems.

title: Design System Architecture - RFC Review and Revisions
description: This RFC proposes the design of the overall system architecture for the InnovationIncubator project. The design is broken down into smaller tasks to facilitate easier implementation, with clear dependencies on 'Define Project Scope and Requirements' and 'Gather Non-Functional Requirements'. A microservices approach will be employed to increase scalability and maintainability. Open-source technologies will be primarily used for cost-effectiveness and community support. Detailed explanations of chosen technologies, their advantages, and the rationale behind them will be provided. Infrastructure requirements will be clarified in detail, including cloud services (AWS), storage solutions (S3), database configurations (MySQL), and an explanation of how these choices contribute to system performance, scalability, and security. This RFC is open for discussion, improvements, and suggestions. The following changes are proposed: 1. Break the architecture design into smaller tasks with clear dependency on 'Define Project Scope and Requirements' and 'Gather Non-Functional Requirements'. 2. Incorporate microservices approach to increase scalability and maintainability. 3. Provide detailed explanations of chosen technologies, their advantages, and the rationale behind them with a focus on open-source technologies for cost-effectiveness and community support. 4. Clarify infrastructure requirements in detail, including cloud services (AWS), storage solutions (S3), database configurations (MySQL), and explain how these choices contribute to system performance, scalability, and security. This RFC is ready for the 'APPROVAL' state once feedback and suggestions have been incorporated.

title: Design User Interface and Experience (UI/UX) - Refactored
description: Refine the design of the user interface and user experience for the InnovationIncubator platform. This includes wireframes, mockups, prototypes, accessibility considerations, high-fidelity visual design elements, and interactive design elements. Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure the design aligns with project goals, meets user needs, is scalable for future growth, and optimized for performance and cross-device compatibility. Additionally, incorporate feedback from 'Define Project Scope and Requirements' and 'Conduct User Research and Persona Analysis' tasks. Lastly, consider progressive enhancement principles.
dependencies: Conduct User Research and Persona Analysis

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including version control, build tools, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

title: Design Scalable, Secure and Performant Database Schema for InnovationIncubator
description: Design the database schema to store and manage innovation initiatives, user data, roles and permissions, and other relevant information for the InnovationIncubator project. The design should be modular, extensible, and adhere to best practices for data modeling. It should consider scalability, security, and performance requirements. Additionally, ensure the schema is compatible with our existing systems for seamless integration. Implement version control mechanisms for easier updates and rollbacks. Consider implementing sharding or partitioning techniques to enhance scalability. Also, ensure the design aligns with our data privacy policies.

title: Implement Backend Services
description: Develop and implement backend services for the platform, including APIs, business logic, and integration with other systems.

title: Implement Frontend Components
description: Develop and implement frontend components for the platform, including user interfaces, navigation, and interactions.

title: Implement Comprehensive Security Measures (Revised)
description: Update the platform with robust security measures such as multi-factor authentication, role-based access control, data encryption at rest and in transit, regular vulnerability testing, secure coding practices, implementation of a centralized logging system for monitoring and auditing purposes. Also, consider implementing features like single sign-on (SSO), access tokens, and rate limiting.

title: Write Documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the platform, including user guides, developer guides, and API documentation.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Perform thorough testing and quality assurance for the platform, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deploy and Monitor Platform
description: Deploy the InnovationIncubator platform to production environments, and set up monitoring and logging systems.
